meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family with showy flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful columbines.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of columbines for her mother.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns in the columbines.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bloomed like columbines in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted the field of columbines with delicate strokes.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Aquilegia.
meanings.sent1: The columbines in the garden attracted hummingbirds.
meanings.sent2: The florist recommended planting columbines in the shade.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat sniffed at the columbines, intrigued by their scent.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness blossomed like the columbines in the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The hiker marveled at the beauty of the wild columbines along the trail.

meanings.definition: A plant with lobed leaves and spurred flowers.
meanings.sent1: The columbines swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The gardener carefully watered the columbines in the flower bed.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the columbines were tiny fairy houses.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as soft and delicate as the columbines in the field.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the petals of the columbines, creating a magical glow.
